item.title: The Best Mouth Tape (2025)
item.description: TikTokkers and biohackers are fast to recommend mouth tape for better sleep. But it’s not a solution for everyone.

item.title: Uber’s Drive to Become the Kleenex of Robotaxis
item.description: It doesn’t matter who makes the tech—when you call a robocar, Uber’s mission now is to make sure you use its app.

item.title: Handwave lends a hand to retailers with its European alternative to Amazon’s palm payments
item.description: Latvian startup Handwave aims to compete with Amazon palm payments by offering an independent alternative.
